files.README.md:
# Pleo Sandbox Marketplace

Official Claude Code plugin marketplace for Pleo engineering teams.

## Installation

Add this marketplace to your Claude Code:

```
/plugin marketplace add pleo-sandbox/pleo-sandbox-marketplace
```

## Available Plugins

- **backend-plugins** - Claude Code plugin collection for engineers at Pleo
- **devx-skills** - Shared skills for DevX engineers (investigation workflows, debugging techniques, operational best practices)

## Purpose

This marketplace provides a centralized collection of Claude Code plugins for all Pleo engineers.
